title: My skin is gone
body:
My skin is gone
No refunds available

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=AstroNax,realm=EUW,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=Og25cdk1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-29T13:25:29.600+0000)
>
> .............

If you need help about a _disappeared_ skin, you can open a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

If for some reason you prefer to get help from the community, you can open a new topic here: https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en

Since this is the italian support forum, and you are supposed to speak italian here, I'm going to close this topic.
